com.icodici.universa.node2.network

Class DatagramAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.icodici.universa.node2.network.DatagramAdapter
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    UDPAdapter

    public abstract class DatagramAdapter
extends java.lang.Object
    Adapter to the Universa Node UDP protocol v2. Protocol description: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1vlRQu5pcqWlOUT3yzBEKTq95jM8XlRutP-tR-aoUUiI/edit?usp=sharing

    • Field Detail

      • MAX_PACKET_SIZE

        public static final int MAX_PACKET_SIZE
        Maximum packet size in bytes. Adapter should try to send several blocks together as long as the overall encoded packet sie is no more than MAX_PACKET_SIZE with all extra data attached.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • RETRANSMIT_MAX_ATTEMPTS

        public static final int RETRANSMIT_MAX_ATTEMPTS
        Max number of attempts to retransmit a block, defaults to 10
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • RETRANSMIT_TIME

        public static final int RETRANSMIT_TIME
        Time between attempts to retransmit a DATA block, in milliseconds
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Constructor Detail

      • DatagramAdapter

        public DatagramAdapter(com.icodici.crypto.PrivateKey ownPrivateKey,
                       com.icodici.crypto.SymmetricKey sessionKey,
                       NodeInfo myNodeInfo,
                       NetConfig netConfig)
        Create an instance that listens for the incoming datagrams using the specified configurations. The adapter should start serving incoming datagrams immediately upon creation.
        Parameters:
        ownPrivateKey - is PrivateKey for signing requests
        sessionKey - is SymmetricKey with session
        myNodeInfo - is NodeInfo object described node this UDPAdapter work with
        netConfig - is NetConfig where all nodes data is stored
